mapper.select: select a.REPORT_SEQ, a.REPORT_TITLE, a.REPORT_DC, a.REPORT_URL, a.REPORT_GUBUN, a.REPORT_UESYN reportUseYn, a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, a.FRST_REGISTER_ID , a.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, a.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, REPORT_PREVIEW from tb_reportinfo a where a.REPORT_SEQ = #{reportSeq}

select a.REPORT_SEQ, a.REPORT_TITLE, a.REPORT_DC, a.REPORT_URL, fn_DetailCodeNm(a.REPORT_GUBUN) as reportGubun, a.REPORT_UESYN reportUseYn, a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, a.FRST_REGISTER_ID , a.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, a.LAST_UPDUSR_ID from tb_reportinfo a where REPORT_SEQ = #{reportSeq}

select case a.REPORT_GUBUN when 'reportGubun_3' then (select ifnull(PLAY_TIME, 1) from lettnfiledetail b where b.REPORT_SEQ = a.REPORT_SEQ) else '1' end as PLAY_TIME from tb_reportinfo a where a.REPORT_SEQ = #{reportSeq}

SELECT ifnull(count(*),0) FROM tb_reportinfo a WHERE 1=1
and a.REPORT_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
and a.REPORT_DC LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
and REPORT_UESYN = #{reportUseYn}
mapper.update: update tb_reportinfo set REPORT_PREVIEW = #{reportPreview} where REPORT_SEQ = #{reportSeq}
